description: React store module using Zustand for managing customers data, including functions to add, get, update, and remove customers.

methods.name: addCustomer
methods.description: Adds a new customer to the store with a generated ID.

methods.name: getCustomer
methods.description: Retrieves a customer by ID from the store.

methods.name: updateCustomer
methods.description: Updates an existing customer's details in the store.

methods.name: removeCustomer
methods.description: Removes a customer from the store by ID.
